---
id: spv
title: "spv"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/spv"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Blocking request to fetch spv proof of a cross chain transaction. Request must be sent to the chain where the transaction is initiated.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"targetChainId"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
